wmndsTextareaProps.name: id
wmndsTextareaProps.description: Required. Must be unique. The id of the textarea.

wmndsTextareaProps.name: name
wmndsTextareaProps.description: Required. The name of the textarea, which is submitted with the form data.

wmndsTextareaProps.name: rows
wmndsTextareaProps.description: Optional number of textarea rows. Default is 3 rows.

wmndsTextareaProps.name: required
wmndsTextareaProps.description: If true, textarea is required/must be filled out. Defaults to false.

wmndsTextareaProps.name: errorMessage
wmndsTextareaProps.description: Options for the error message component. See errorMessage.

arrayOptions.name: id
arrayOptions.description: Id attribute to add to the error message span tag.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. Text to use within the error message. If contentHTML is supplied, this is ignored.

arrayOptions.name: contentHTML
arrayOptions.description: Required. HTML to use within the error message

arrayOptions.name: classes
arrayOptions.description: Classes to add to the error message span tag.

wmndsTextareaProps.name: classes
wmndsTextareaProps.description: Classes to add to the textarea.

wmndsTextareaProps.name: Label
wmndsTextareaProps.description: Required. Options for the label component. See label.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. If `contentHTML` is set, this is not required. Text to use within the label. If `contentHTML` is provided, the `contentText` argument will be ignored.

arrayOptions.name: contentHTML
arrayOptions.description: Required. If `contentText` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within the label. If `contentHTML` is provided, the `contentText` argument will be ignored.

arrayOptions.name: for
arrayOptions.description: The value of the for attribute, the id of the input the label is associated with.

arrayOptions.name: classes
arrayOptions.description: Classes to add to the label tag.

wmndsTextareaProps.name: formGroup
wmndsTextareaProps.description: Options for the form-group wrapper See formGroup below.

arrayOptions.name: classes
arrayOptions.description: Classes to add to the form group (e.g. to show error state for the whole group)

wmndsTextareaProps.name: Attributes
wmndsTextareaProps.description: Attribute to identify textarea purpose, for instance postal-code or username. See autofill for full list of attributes that can be used.

arrayOptions.name: autocomplete
arrayOptions.description: Attribute to identify input purpose, for instance postal-code or username. See autofill for full list of attributes that can be used.

arrayOptions.name: autofocus
arrayOptions.description: If true, the text area should automatically get focus when the page loads. Defaults to false.

arrayOptions.name: spellcheck
arrayOptions.description: Optional field to enable or disable the spellcheck attribute on the textarea.

arrayOptions.name: disabled
arrayOptions.description: If true, textarea should be disabled. Defaults to false.

arrayOptions.name: formId
arrayOptions.description: The form id from the form which the text area belongs to. It's an optional field.

arrayOptions.name: maxLength
arrayOptions.description: The maxLength is the maximum number of characters allowed in the text area. It's an optional field.

arrayOptions.name: placeholder
arrayOptions.description: Placeholder is a short hint that describes the expected value of a text area. It's an optional field.

arrayOptions.name: value
arrayOptions.description: Optional initial value of the textarea.
